reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 157/10: PUBLIC BODIES - PART III.1 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: Public Bodies — Part III.1 of the Act
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 157/10: PUBLIC BODIES - PART III.1 OF THE ACT

content.content: 1. The following are prescribed as public bodies for the purposes of Part III.1 of the Act: 1. Agricultural Research Institute of Ontario. 2. Hydro One Inc. 3. Liquor Control Board of Ontario. 4. McMichael Canadian Art Collection. 5. Metrolinx. 6. The Niagara Parks Commission. 7. Ontario Heritage Trust. 8. Ontario Infrastructure and Lands Corporation. 9. Ontario Lottery and Gaming Corporation. 9.1 Ontario Place Corporation. 10. Ontario Power Generation Inc. 11.  Revoked:  O. Reg. 200/11, s. 1 (2). 12. Royal Botanical Gardens. 13.  Revoked: O. Reg. 155/14, s. 1 (2). 14. St. Lawrence Parks Commission. O. Reg. 157/10, s. 1; O. Reg. 200/11, s. 1; O. Reg. 155/14, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following are prescribed as public bodies for the purposes of Part III.1 of the Act:

1. Agricultural Research Institute of Ontario.

2. Hydro One Inc.

3. Liquor Control Board of Ontario.

4. McMichael Canadian Art Collection.

5. Metrolinx.

6. The Niagara Parks Commission.

7. Ontario Heritage Trust.

8. Ontario Infrastructure and Lands Corporation.

9. Ontario Lottery and Gaming Corporation.

9.1 Ontario Place Corporation.

10. Ontario Power Generation Inc.

11. Revoked:  O. Reg. 200/11, s. 1 (2).

12. Royal Botanical Gardens.

13. Revoked: O. Reg. 155/14, s. 1 (2).

14. St. Lawrence Parks Commission. O. Reg. 157/10, s. 1; O. Reg. 200/11, s. 1; O. Reg. 155/14, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 157/10, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 157/10, s. 2.
